p: The annual average accumulative rainfall and average temperature are 2,022.4 mm and 25.1°C, respectively (1980–2010, Central Weather Bureau). The climate is seasonal; most of the rainfall (91%) occurs during the warm–wet season and the typhoon season occurs from May to October [ 45], and it is considered to be equatorial and monsoonal [ 46]. Besides the study species, the local coastal vegetation is composed mainly of the following species: Premna serratifolia, Hibiscus tiliaceus, Pemphis acidula, F. tinctoria ssp. swinhoei, Sophora tomentosa, and Clerodendrum inerme.
